anchors.$comment: Moves from 0,0,0 to 50,50,50 at a speed of 10uu/s and snaps back 0 to loop forever. Also rotates constantly with the given euler XYZ values
anchors.name: simple move

anchors.$comment: This shares the same name as the first and so will have the same mesh hash in Remix. It is scaled, and also has a defined starting rotation.
anchors.name: simple move

anchors.$comment: Uses the ping-pong movement and so after reaching end_loc will instead begin travelling back to start_loc instead of snapping back
anchors.name: moving back and forth

anchors.$comment: This anchor will have a static location (can still rotate) so end_loc and speed need not be defined
anchors.name: static anchor

_default_level.$comment: These properties for '_default_level' are used if the current level name hasn't had it's properties defined
